If for some reason you found something more fun than taxes and didn’t get started yet — now’s the time! 

Getting started is now easier with a quick way to tailor your experience and get you closer to finishing your taxes.

Note:  The next version requires iOS 8.4 and above.

Thanks for using TurboTax!

New features:
- With this new update, you’ll be able to navigate through our customized pricing options that contains functionality only offered on iOS.
- When you need a bit more info than what is provided on the screen, you can view our help links in the full screen mode.

Upcoming:
- Now that Apple has released iOS 10, we will soon be no longer supporting iOS 8. We encourage you to install iOS 10 and bask in the amazing awesomeness it offers!

Ladies and Gentlemen, welcome to the new tax season! We are back at it again with a brand new version of TurboTax, and we feel it’s our best ever. Some of our new features this year include: 
 
- Live on-screen video help with SmartLook™
- Enhanced W-2 import – just snap a photo of your W-2 and we’ll automatically fill in the right tax forms
- Leverage Touch ID to securely and quickly sign into your account
- Understand the “whys” behind your refund, in a tap with ExplainWhy™
 
-------------------------------------------
 
Thank you very much for using TurboTax. Let’s get taxes over and done with so you can get back to the important things in life, like pizza and Westworld.

Whew, it’s tax time again! But don’t worry… You’re gonna do great! Just to make sure, we’ve added new help features. So this year, you’ll get all the help you need and never feel alone.

-- Need answers to (really) tough tax questions, ASAP? No problem! Just ask our new virtual assistant. Search top FAQs or enter your question to get personalized answers, served up just for you.

-- Rather talk to a human? We can help with that, too. Just ask our virtual assistant to connect you with SmartLook™. You’ll get live, expert guidance right on your screen.  

Snap. Tap. Done.®

We have so much cool new stuff to tell you about. Check it:
- Ask our virtual assistant for answers to your toughest questions.
- Need a human? Use SmartLook™ to connect to tax pros and get personalized, real-time answers.
- CompleteCheck™ scans your return, buttons up all your last-minute details and gives you the green light to file.
- Snap a selfie, use a filter, and show the world your #taxesdoneface.

We're ready to get started on your 2017 taxes! We've updated the app to bring in all the latest 2017 tax code. Also, now you can uncover industry specific deductions to get every deduction you deserve with TurboTax Self-Employed. We also visually enhanced the navigation and added the ability to easily navigate to Turbo℠ and Mint right from the app.

March doesn't have to be madness, you've got the TurboTax app!
 
This release features a fresh set of filters you can use to take a celebration selfie when you finish your taxes. Share your #taxesdoneface selfie on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram, email, etc. and you'll get $10 from Amazon.com when your friend files with TurboTax! (Your friend will need to use the link you share to file their taxes for you to get the $10)
 
We also improved performance, and fixed a handful of bugs.
 
And of course, we still have all the new features added during this tax season:
•  Uncover industry specific deductions to get every deduction you deserve with TurboTax Self-Employed
•  Redesigned global navigation to easily jump around your tax return
•  Ability to easily navigate to Turbo℠, Mint, TaxCaster, and ItsDeductible right from the app
After another trip around the sun, it's time to get your taxes done! This release also fixes an issue with email verification in the tax filing step that some users were experiencing.

TurboTax is here and updated for tax year 2020! This release features a whole new way to get your taxes done – by connecting with your own dedicated tax expert who'll do your taxes for you, start-to-finish, so you can be 100% confidence your return is done right. Of course, you can also still do it yourself or you can even start on your own and have real tax experts to help along the way with your taxes using TurboTax Live!

Also new this year:
• Personalized home page dashboard to view your return progress, return amount, and easily jump to tax topics
• Bottom navigation with access to document storage, tax tip articles, and settings

-A whole new option to get your taxes done – by connecting with your own dedicated tax expert who'll do your taxes for you, start-to-finish, so you can be 100% confident your return is done right. 
-Personalized homepage dashboard to view your return progress, return amount, and easily jump to tax topics
-Bottom navigation with access to document storage, tax tip articles, and app settings

If TurboTax is a candy heart, this release might be the sweetest one yet. There's a fresh new digital assistant for getting help as you go, it will give you smarter/faster answers, and will even listen to your voice. Also new stimulus, unemployment, and other content added to the tax articles tab. And an app switch added to let you easily jump to Credit Karma!

Also new this year:
* A whole new option to get your taxes done – by connecting with your own dedicated tax expert who'll do your taxes for you, start-to-finish, so you can be 100% confident your return is done right.

* Personalized homepage dashboard to view your return progress, return amount, and easily jump to tax topics
* Bottom navigation with access to document storage, tax tip articles, and app settings
